title: WHEN does RANKED COME BACK UPPPPPPPP
body: PLzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz i want to rank before my bf wakes up

replies.body: Idk but every morning when I log in LoL the rank option is always unavailable.It comes back around 11pm for me.

Sorry all, we had a planned maintenance this morning that we thought would be done before ranked is turned on at 8am AEST. Unfortunately this ran longer and we made the decision to keep ranked off until it was completed.

I should have posted much sooner for this, apologies on that. We didn't want to risk any interruptions to ranked play.
Doesn't seem like it will be back up soon :( waiting as well

Do you reckon it'll be back today? D: 
I want plat 3 but like I'm busy all weekend until mOnday so today's my only day to rank :((((((((((( WTHHHHHHH IM SO SAD. i was so excited tooooooooooo
